Class Country

  • java.lang.Object
    • Country

  • public class Country
extends java.lang.Object
    This class creates new SubscriptionYear objects and saves them in an array. It also takes a starting and ending year that it pulls out the average subscriptions of.

      private int c 
      private java.lang.String name

      This method is a Constructor that takes in the country name and number of years.

        eyear - The integer value of the ending year
        Returns:
